sources.title: Scouts to the Rescue (1956)
sources.description: Good Deed Daly joins his fellow scouts camping near a buffalo-protective reservation. When a villain tries to get away with several of the dwindling herd, Daly comes to the rescue and, with the aid of the other scouts, soon has the villain in hand. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/scouts-to-the-rescue-1956/

metadata.Plot: Good Deed Daly joins his fellow scouts camping near a buffalo-protective reservation. When a villain tries to get away with several of the dwindling herd, Daly comes to the rescue and, with the aid of the other scouts, soon has the villain in hand.
